data.text:
Mark your calendar and visit our “Takeoff to New Views” pop-up shop in New York City! Taste German sweets 🍫, Italian coffee ☕️, Indian spices 🌶, and learn about our new #Boeing787.
🗓 December 1st: 12 PM - 5 PM
🗓 December 2nd: 11 AM - 7 PM
📍 34 Little West 12th St, Manhattan https://t.co/sbcPWKBhui

data.text: “Puglia is a long region, so the best way to travel is to rent a car. What a unique adventure it was to rent a vintage Alfa Romeo convertible, cruising top down from the town of Oria to the famous village of Alberobello with its UNESCO world heritage "trulli" cottages!” (3/5) https://t.co/atefJdywSO
